name: Riot Girl Tristana
description: Despite the RPD's best efforts to curb Tristana's enthusiasm for vigilante justice, they haven't been successful. Then again, with a combination of determination, moxy, and explosives, she's more than capable of evading The Man. Whenever Tristana is "off-duty," she can be found at a punk show or passing out the newest edition of her zine, "Riot Riot!
